name: Pix, The Legend of The Endless.
name_original: Pix, The Legend of The Endless.
description:
Pix, The Legend of the Endless... Is a game where you play as Pix, an ordinary dude that has an everlasting urge to open doors. These doors will lead to his ultimate fate! Monsters chase after you, you cannot fight them, avoid their evil grasps to stay alive! Collect coins and food items to gain health and score points. Each action is turn-based. Get the highest score you can ! Then challenge your friends to beat you!

Enjoy the game!

If this game reaches a GOAL OF 25 usd In SALES, I will release the MOBILE VERSION of the game for the google playstore! The 25 usd will be used to acquire a developer account, so that I can post apps to the playstore, the first being a mobile version of this game.

Thank you for your support!

Controls:

Left, Right, Up and Down arrows to move.

P or Esc for pause menu.

To pick up objects just move over them using the movement keys.

For android: Intuitive touch controls, back button for pause menu, virtual Gamepad also available in pause menu.
